Gatekeeper Bella:

You are a Death Knight? For real?

Oh, sorry. I've heard that Death Knights stay away from our worldly affairs and dedicate themselves to some mysterious things, so I never thought I would see one in the flesh.

It looks like you are ready to heed the call for adventure.

As far as I know the Death Knight base has its own Gatekeeper but I guess you haven't met them.

Well, you should learn to find suitable places to train then.
